about_us.header: Welcome to the website of Modern Metal Art.
about_us.paragraph_1: What started out as a niche type of hobby — creating metal art — blosommed into a full fledged operation.
about_us.paragraph_2: This happened after the need for steelworks was evident by growing number of diverse product requests.
about_us.paragraph_3: Metal Art Master has built a network of strong relationships within the industry that allow us to work on a range of different projects. We value both our new and regular clients.
about_us.paragraph_4: We have extensive experience in all types of steelwork – structural steel for industrial and commercial structures, industrial retro-fit expansions.
about_us.paragraph_5: What binds together every member of the Metal Art Master family is a shared passion for metal artworks, shaped by value-based guiding principles.
